thread.title: 1st stop Book shop!
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by 1st stop Book shop!

author: 1st stop Book shop!
title: 1st stop Book shop!
text: I was purchasing a book originally priced over 38.00 and knew I could beat the price even if I had to buy used. I checked the "Thrift Book" site first because I was drawn to the name...then I found the exact book for less that 4.00 NEW!!! I bought 3 for less than 11.00 with shipping.
